definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
and so on/in a similar fashion

sentences.english: For example, the meridian pertaining to the kidney is named the kidney meridian, and the rest may be deduced by analogy.
sentences.chinese: 例如，属于肾的经脉命名为肾经，其余由此类推。

sentences.english: If you need an analogy, use an animal.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要类推，那就用动物作比吧。

sentences.english: Think back to our map analogy.
sentences.chinese: 让我们回头想想地图的类推。

sentences.english: Each impact three others and three others.
sentences.chinese: 每个再影响三个，以此类推。

sentences.english: When is again same, before attains the second many row, ex analogia.
sentences.chinese: 再相同时，以获第二名较多者列前，以此类推。

sentences.english: The analogies to our most recent foreign policy debates are obvious and telling.
sentences.chinese: 以此类推，我们最近的外交政策辩论也是如此。

sentences.english: The insolence and brutality of anger, in the same manner, when we indulge its fury without check or restraint, is, of all objects, the most detestable.
sentences.chinese: 以此类推，无所顾忌傲慢粗鲁的愤怒是最令人憎恶的。

sentences.english: This is the resolution encountered in standard analogical television and standard computer applications.
sentences.chinese: 这是在标准类推电视和标准计算机应用遇到的决议。

sentences.english: The formation of separable two-character word group also suffers from the role of analogy.
sentences.chinese: 汉语离合二字组的产生同时受着类推作用的影响。

sentences.english: In this context, history could repeat itself in the Arab World.
sentences.chinese: 以此类推，阿拉伯世界有可能重蹈覆辙。

sentences.english: If not, the token is skipped and the next one is tested, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 否则跳过这个标记并检查下一个，依此类推。

sentences.english: General and fuzzy analogy estimate in bidding of overall items.
sentences.chinese: 措施项目一般类推和模糊类推快速报价法。

sentences.english: General and fuzzy analogy estimate in bidding of overall items.
sentences.chinese: 措施项目一般类推和模糊类推快速报价法。

sentences.english: I want to give you an analogy.
An analogical application item was added to the new Contract Laws which was en-acted last year in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我国去年颁布的《合同法》中增加了类推适用条款。

definition: Tongli, a city in Jiangsu Province, China
method of counting (e.g. decimal or Roman numbers)
